profileAlternative.name: Prakash Shelokar
profileAlternative.headline: Director Technology at Xoriant
profileAlternative.summary:
15+ years of Industrial and R&D Experience in developing predictive analytics solutions in the area of Marketing Analytics, Customer Insights, Telecom, Health Care, Operational Risk Management, Natural Language Processing, etc.

Transforming business problems into analytical solutions and identifying relevant use cases with business metrics.

Solution design, development and implementation of Data Mining, Machine Learning, Text Mining, and Statistical Methods to solve business problems.

Application of Data Science techniques:
- Text Mining (Sentiment Analysis, Topic Modeling, Semantic Search, Named Entity Recognition)
- Machine Learning (Logistic Regression, SVM, Random Forest, Gradient Boosting)
- Data Mining (K-means, DBSCAN clustering, Association Rule Mining)
- Statistical (PCA, Mahalanobis distance, Box-plot)

- Experience in Predictive Analytics training for junior and senior team members across analytics group.

- 5+ years of Post-doctorate research experience in Graph Pattern Mining, Frequent Pattern Mining, Social Media Analysis.
- 25+ peer-reviewed publications in international conferences and journals.

Interests:
- Data Mining, Machine Learning, Text Mining
- Gain deep business understanding to align technical solution to business domain

Skills:
sentiment analysis, topic modeling, semantic search
anomaly/outlier detection, risk scoring
customer personalization & segmentation, campaign design
Customer Churn Prediction

Analytics Software Skills: Python, R, Matlab, WEKA

positions.title: Xoriant
positions.description:
Role:
- Head, Data Science Team
- SME in data science for transforming business problem into analytical solution.
- Development of PoC
- Support Pre-sales
- Predictive analytics training

Solutions:
- Mobile users Gender, Age-group prediction based on internet usage on their handset
- Mobile users Home and Work locations prediction based on movement logs (latitude, longitude)
- Topic identification and sentiment scoring for doctors based on patient reviews.
- Semantic Search for cause identification in operational risk management documents
- Event Identification with details of Place and Location of event from online local news media
…

roles.title: Technical Architect (Data Science)
roles.description:
Role:
- Head, Data Science Team
- SME in data science for transforming business problem into analytical solution.
- Development of PoC

- Mobile users Home and Work locations prediction based on movement logs (latitude, longitude)
- Topic identification and sentiment scoring for doctors based on patient reviews.
- Semantic Search for cause identification in operational risk management documents
- Event Identification with details of Place and Location of event from online local news media
…

positions.title: Analytics Lead
positions.description:
Development of advanced analytical solutions to successfully address business problems such as Accelerated Risk Management, Outlier detection, Propensity Modeling, Customer Segmentation, Mining and classifying text data, Site selection.
Experience of leading analytics teams, developing end to end algorithmic processes, training junior team members, training analytics group.
Experience in Machine Learning in Python (scikit-learn, pandas, numpy libraries)
…

positions.title: Postdoctoral Researcher
positions.description:
The application and development of artificial intelligence techniques, data mining and multiobjective optimization for meaningful pattern mining in graph represented data in the area of information science, web data and chemical data.
Principal Investigator for one and Co-Investigator for two research projects sponsored by the Spanish Government.
Problem formulation and algorithm development for marine vessel routing optimization sponsored by an Oil & Gas Company.
Experience in genetic algorithms, ant colony optimization, multiobjective optimization, rule-based classification, clustering, frequent pattern mining in graph-based data.
…

positions.title: National Chemical Laboratory
positions.description: R&D Experience as a part of PhD Thesis on the development of Computational Intelligence methods for data mining problems including Classification, Clustering, Regression etc.

roles.title: Research Fellow
roles.description: R&D Experience as a part of PhD Thesis on the development of Computational Intelligence methods for data mining problems including Classification, Clustering, Regression etc.

roles.title: Research Fellow
roles.description:
R&D Experience as a part of M.E.(by Res.) work on the development of Computational Intelligence methods to solve optimization and data mining problems.

• Project: Classification of E. coli Bacterial Growth Data; Rules of the IF-THEN form were produced to identify the bacteria growth conditions.
• Project: Data Clustering using ant colony optimization; Developed a new algorithm to find optimal clusters in the data.
…

roles.title: Project Assistant
roles.description:
Application of evolutionary algorithms to solve combinatorial, continuous, and dynamic optimization problems in process engineering.
Worked with analytics software: Matlab, WEKA
Programming languages: C/C++, Java

positions.title: Application Developer (consultant)
positions.description:
Guiding development of technical work flows for the InforSense customer support hub that was a key differentiator for Inforsense to retain and win new clients from areas ranging from bioinformatics, chemoinformatics to clinical informatics. These clients apply Inforsense KDE platform to perform data analysis tasks such as data cleaning, classification, regression, clustering, and data visualization
…

positions.title: National Chemical Laboratory/University of Pune
positions.description:
Thesis has developed Computational Intelligence techniques to solve combinatorial and continuous function optimization problems, data mining applications in process engineering.

Techniques: Ant colony optimization; Genetic Algorithms; Decision Trees; SVM; k-means clustering
Problems: Optimization, Clustering, Classification
Tools: MatLab, R, WEKA

positions.title: Nagpur University
positions.description: Master project has developed Computational Intelligence techniques for solving multiobjective and dynamic process optimization problems.

educations.title: National Chemical Laboratory/University of Pune
educations.fieldofstudy: Application of Metaheuristics in Process System Engineering

given.text: Shreyas joined our groupd at National Chemical Laboratory as an undergraduate student to work on his Bachelor's Degree project. After successful completion of the project, he was offered the project assistant position to work on the Government Funded Research Project. He has displayed a good blend of kno... See more
